summary: Harvest Gamification features testing complete. All 31 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified with all features working correctly: Today tab with progress ring (19/75 doors), streak flame indicator (1 Day), stats grid (Doors, Appts, Signed, Points), Today's Challenges section, Next Reward progress. Profile tab with total points (376), streak badge, badge collection with tier filters (All, Legendary, Epic, Rare, Common), badge count (1/16), This Week stats grid, and Rewards Progress section.
critical_code_review_comments: All Harvest Gamification API endpoints properly protected with authentication (returns 401/403 for unauthorized requests)
Progress ring correctly displays 19/75 doors with animated SVG gradient
Streak flame indicator shows '1 Day' with ðŸ”¥ emoji and CURRENT STREAK label
Stats grid displays all 4 metrics: Doors (19), Appts (1), Signed (1), Points (376)
Today's Challenges section shows empty state with 'No active challenges' message
Next Reward progress shows TEST_Reward_1269ba4d at 75.2% (124 points to go)
Profile tab shows Total Points (376) with 1 day streak badge
Badge collection shows 1/16 earned with tier filters: All, Legendary (0), Epic (0), Rare (0), Common (1)
Locked badges displayed with lock icons and proper styling
This Week stats grid shows: Doors (19), Appointments (1), Contracts (1), Best Streak (1)
Rewards Progress section shows multiple rewards with progress bars
Data consistency verified: points (376), streak (1), doors_today (19) match across all endpoints
Streak multiplier logic correctly implemented: 1.0x for 1-day streak
seed_data_creation: None - used existing test data from previous iterations
context_for_next_testing_agent: Harvest Gamification fully functional at /canvassing route. Today tab shows progress ring (19/75), streak flame (1 Day), stats grid, challenges (empty), next reward progress. Profile tab shows 376 points, 1 day streak, badges (1/16 earned), tier filters working, rewards progress. User test@eden.com has 19 doors today, 376 points, 1 day streak, 1 badge earned (Ten Doors Down). No active campaigns or challenges.

Today Tab - Progress Ring.details: Animated SVG progress ring showing 19/75 doors with orange-red gradient

Today Tab - Streak Flame Indicator.details: Shows ðŸ”¥ emoji with 'CURRENT STREAK' label and '1 Day' text

Today Tab - Stats Grid.details: 4-column grid showing Doors (19), Appts (1), Signed (1), Points (376)

Today Tab - Today's Challenges.details: Section loads from /api/harvest/challenges, shows empty state with 'No active challenges'

Today Tab - Next Reward Progress.details: Shows TEST_Reward_1269ba4d at 75.2% complete, 124 points to go

Profile Tab - Total Points.details: Displays 376 points with fire emoji avatar

Profile Tab - Streak Badge.details: Shows '1 day streak' badge below points

Profile Tab - Badge Collection.details: Shows 1/16 badges earned with grid of locked/unlocked badges

Profile Tab - Tier Filters.details: All, Legendary (0), Epic (0), Rare (0), Common (1) filters working

Profile Tab - This Week Stats.details: 2x2 grid showing Doors (19), Appointments (1), Contracts (1), Best Streak (1)

Profile Tab - Rewards Progress.details: Shows rewards with progress bars and points required

GET /api/harvest/streak.details: Returns current_streak (1), best_streak (1), multiplier (1.0), doors_today (19), is_at_risk (false)

GET /api/harvest/badges/tiers.details: Returns badges organized by tier: common (12), rare (2), epic (1), legendary (1). User earned 1/16

GET /api/harvest/progress/rewards.details: Returns current_points (376), rewards_progress with percent_complete, next_reward info

GET /api/canvassing-map/stats.details: Returns today (19), week (19), signed (1), appointments (1), total_points (376)
